title: ECB Staff Unhappy With Christine Lagardeâ€™s Leadership, Survey Shows
description: A survey of European Central Bank (ECB) staff has revealed widespread dissatisfaction with President Christine Lagarde’s leadership. More than half of the respondents rated Lagarde’s performance as “very poor” or “poor.” Some expressed concerns that the former International Monetary Fund (IMF) chief “does not necessarily act according to the values she proclaims.” Lagarde Spends ‘Too […]

title: SAG-AFTRA Condemns Fake Explicit Images of Taylor Swift, Calls for Legal Action
description: SAG-AFTRA, a prominent labor union representing performers, has taken a firm stand against the circulation of artificial intelligence-generated explicit images depicting Taylor Swift. Characterizing the images as upsetting, harmful, and deeply concerning, the union’s declaration underscores the urgent need for legal measures to combat the proliferation of fake imagery, particularly those of a lewd nature.
